question: Kaun-kaun se Mars ke products aapke store pe available hain?
user_answer: Haan, humare store pe Snickers, Mars Bar aur Twix available hain.

question: Aapke store pe kaunse products sabse zyada bikte hain, aur aap khud regularly kaunse products lete hain?
user_answer: Snickers sabse zyada bikta hai, aur mai khud bhi aksar Bounty leta hoon.

question: Abhi filhaal kaunse products ki demand zyada chal rahi hai?
user_answer: Filhaal Mars Bar ki demand zyada hai, kyunki uspe achha discount chal raha hai.

question: Jab scheme milta hai toh sales badhti hai ya waise hi rehti hai?
user_answer: Haan, jab scheme milti hai toh sales badhti hai, kyunki log discount dekh ke zyada kharidte hain.

question: Kya customers Mars ke naye products try karne me interested hote hain?
user_answer: Haan, naye products try karne ka shauk hota hai customers ko, lekin agar koi achha offer ho toh aur bhi zyada interest dikhate hain.
